title: Instagram Followers Scraper Input
description: Configuration for the Instagram Followers Scraper

user_id.title: User ID
user_id.description: Instagram user ID (numeric). You can find this using the mobile app inspection.

authorization_token.title: Authorization Token
authorization_token.description: Bearer token from Instagram app. Format: Bearer IGT:2:xxxxx

cookie_x_mid.title: Cookie: x-mid
cookie_x_mid.description: x-mid cookie value from Instagram session

cookie_ds_user_id.title: Cookie: ig-u-ds-user-id
cookie_ds_user_id.description: ds_user_id cookie value (usually same as user_id)

cookie_rur.title: Cookie: ig-u-rur
cookie_rur.description: rur cookie value from Instagram session

max_followers.title: Max Followers
max_followers.description: Maximum number of followers to scrape. Leave empty for all.

delay.title: Delay Between Requests (seconds)
delay.description: Delay between pagination requests to avoid rate limiting

webhook_url.title: Webhook URL
webhook_url.description: Optional webhook URL to notify when scraping is complete (for n8n integration)
